notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: Conceptualization, E.P.-R., M.R.-R., M.D.M. and A.B.; methodology, E.P.-R., G.G.-B., M.R.-R., Á.M.-A. and A.B.; validation, E.P.-R., G.G.-B., M.R.-R., Á.M.-A., E.A., J.M.B., R.M.-M., M.D.M. and A.B.; formal analysis, E.P.-R., G.G.-B., M.R.-R. and Á.M.-A.; investigation, E.P.-R., G.G.-B. and M.R.-R.; data curation, E.P.-R.; writing—original draft preparation, E.P.-R. and A.B.; writing—review and editing, E.P.-R., M.R.-R., R.M.-M., M.D.M. and A.B.; visualization, E.P.-R., M.R.-R., Á.M.-A., E.A., J.M.B., R.M.-M., M.D.M. and A.B.; supervision, E.A., R.M.-M., M.D.M. and A.B.; project administration, M.D.M.; funding acquisition, E.A., J.M.B., R.M.-M. and M.D.M. All authors have read and agreed to the published version of the manuscript.
